document_data.name: Temple of the Lady of Mercy
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Lady of Mercy''' was a temple located in [[Hammergate]] dedicated to the [[Dwarf|dwarven]] [[goddess]] [[Sharindlar]]. The temple had a tall statue of the goddess carved from a single huge [[fire opal]] as well as a ritual cleansing pool.{{Cite digital book/The Gilded Rune/Kindle|359}} In the {{YearlinkName|1480}}, the temple inadvertently spread the [[Stoneplague]] by accepting offerings of tainted gold from worshipers.<ref>{{Cite digital book/The Gilded Rune/Kindle|?}}
